name: Pride of the Federation
description:
To stop illegal growing of Poppies and processing drugs only one farm is allowed in the Galaxy. You are John Pride and with your mate Jacko are stationed on the farm to stop any alien attacks. After a night of drinking you have awoken to find the farm taken over. In this three part adventure you must take control back over the farm.

Pride of the Federation is a text only adventure where you read text to describe yuor surroundings while you can type in commands to complete your tasks and solve puzzles.
gamePlay: Interactive fiction / text adventure, Puzzle elements
